alert.note: Alert for Western Bergen; Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 4:15AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...An area of showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of central Passaic, northwestern Bergen, northern Westchester, Orange, western Putnam and Rockland Counties through 515 AM EST... At 414 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harriman, or near Monroe, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New City, Newburgh, Peekskill, Monsey, Nanuet, Ramsey, Ringwood, Haverstraw, Suffern, Monroe, Walden, Nyack, West Point, Warwick and Tappan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
